instructions.reason_for_call: Due to some life changes, you no longer need hiking boots, watch, keyboard, charger, jacket, and running shoes. If cancelling part of the order is not possible, you don't care, just cancel the whole order.
instructions.known_info: You name is James Kim and your email is james.kim1995@example.com.

messages.content: Hi! How can I help you today?

Hello, I actually need to cancel an order I placed. Due to some changes in my life, I no longer need the hiking boots, watch, keyboard, charger, jacket, and running shoes I ordered. If it's not possible to cancel just part of the order, then please cancel the whole order.

message.content: Hello, I actually need to cancel an order I placed. Due to some changes in my life, I no longer need the hiking boots, watch, keyboard, charger, jacket, and running shoes I ordered. If it's not possible to cancel just part of the order, then please cancel the whole order.

messages.content:
I can help with that. Before I do anything I need to locate and authenticate your account. Please provide either:

- Your email address (preferred) — and the order ID (it looks like "#W0000000"),  
or  
- Your full name (first & last) and zip code — and the order ID.

Also confirm: you want to cancel these items from the order — hiking boots, watch, keyboard, charger, jacket, and running shoes — and if partial cancellation is not possible you'd like the entire order cancelled. And please confirm the cancellation reason as "no longer needed" (that is an acceptable reason).

Once I have your account (user id) and the order ID I will check the order status and report what can be cancelled, then I will ask you to confirm the exact cancellation action before proceeding.

- Cancel order #W9722559 (refund $943.83 to PayPal)

Refund note: because the original payment method is PayPal, refunds will take 5–7 business days to appear in your account.

Verify the following before outputting ###STOP###:

1. GOAL SATISFIED: The scenario instruction goal is fully satisfied (the customer's request has been completed as specified in your scenario).

2. NO PENDING EXECUTION: The agent has no pending action to perform. If the agent said they would do something (e.g. cancel an order, process a return), wait until they have confirmed it is done or you have seen the outcome. Do not stop while the agent might still be about to execute something.

3. CORRECT TERMINATION TYPE: You are ending because the task is complete. If you are being transferred to a human, use ###TRANSFER### instead. If the scenario does not provide enough information to continue, use ###OUT-OF-SCOPE### instead.

Only if all checks pass, output ###STOP### in your next message. If any check fails, continue the conversation (e.g. thank the agent and wait, or ask for confirmation).

Thank you for your help and for confirming the cancellations. I appreciate it. That's all I needed today. Have a good day. 

###STOP###
